org.jetel.component.fileoperation.pool

Class ConnectionPool

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.commons.pool.BaseKeyedObjectPool<K,V>
      • org.apache.commons.pool.impl.GenericKeyedObjectPool<Authority,PoolableConnection>
        • org.jetel.component.fileoperation.pool.ConnectionPool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.commons.pool.KeyedObjectPool<Authority,PoolableConnection>

    public class ConnectionPool
extends org.apache.commons.pool.impl.GenericKeyedObjectPool<Authority,PoolableConnection>
    An implementation of a generic connection pool, a thread-safe singleton. A connection is identified with an Authority. When the pool associated with a given authority is empty, an new connection is created and returned. Connections are tested to be functional before they are returned in borrowObject(Authority). GenericKeyedObjectPool ensures that the pools for individual authorities are destroyed when there are no more active or idle objects for a given key.

    • Nested Class Summary
